thread.title: SenS Hotel & Spa Conference opens in Bali, Ubud
thread.title_full: SenS Hotel & Spa Conference opens in Bali, Ubud

author: Bali Island, September 25, 2015
title: SenS Hotel & Spa Conference opens in Bali, Ubud
text: SenS Hotel & Spa Conference opens in Bali, Ubud Bali Island, September 25, 2015 SereS Hotels & Resorts has opened an upscale boutique resort, the SenS Hotel & Spa Conference, in Baliâ€™s cultural town of Ubud. The hotel features 91 rooms and six suites, all equipped with beddings from Serta as well as premium amenities. It also offers facilities for meetings, conferences, events and wedding receptions that can accommodate up to 300 people. Hotel guests can then unwind at the hotel's in-house spa. To celebrate the opening, SenS is offering an introductory price of US$60 per night. The offer runs until the end of 2015.
